short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Item prices, hero stamina alerts and much more for Defi Kingdoms !

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
DFK Alerts is a small chrome plugin to alert you of stamina completion for Defi Kindgoms NFT Heroes. You just paste your wallet address on a textbox (no Metamask or other Wallets needed) and you'll see your heroes.

- Alerts for heroes stamina
- Price information for JEWEL, CRYSTAL, JADE, DFKGOLD, etc.. for Crystalvale (DFKChain) and Serendale 2.0 (Klaytn)
- Floor Prices of Heroes on the Tavern

No 3rd party Javascript libraries or frameworks are used in this project to increase user security.
